Description:
Job Purpose:Developer with strong analytical and technical ability with over 3 years of experience in enterprise Web application development using .NET and .NET Core technologies and Oracle (PL/SQL) as backend database.  
Should have working knowledge of Document Management Systems
Should have hand-on knowledge of C#, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, Angular
Hands-on experience in creating Web APIs and REST Services
Ability to work independently, good communication skills, has experience in working on complex and medium to large projects. 
Person should have worked in Agile/DevOps Environment.Responsibilities:Implement and maintain a suite of applications for Document Management Platform
Implement a framework to integrate into legacy systems and external systems.
Hands on coding, authoring unit tests, performance tests and maintaining high code quality.
Needs to be able to react and provide quick turnaround to business requirements and management requests
Well versed in Agile Development Life CycleRequired Skills:Over 3+ years of experience in enterprise Web application development using .NET (C#), .NET Core and Oracle as backend database.
Ability to work independently, good communication skills, has experience in working on complex and medium to large projects.
Expertise in Git and developing in Continuous Delivery pipeline Hands on experience in .NET, HTML, JAVSCRIPT,XML/XSL,JSON
Experience of Document Management
Expertise in WebServices –REST, SOAP.
Expertise in mocking, unit testing (NUnit) and perf testing of solutions.
Should possess basic Unix knowledge to be able to write and understand basic shell scripts and basic Unix commands
Strong design skills on .NET Solutions
Hands-on experience in Angular
Good understanding on .NET core micro services
Angular knowledge is preferable but is not a must
Financial markets background is preferable but is not a mustQualifications:Bachelor’s degree (in science, computers, information technology or engineering)
Candidate should be willing to work late in the evening India time on need basis in order to interact with US onshore team and to meet urgent requests by Clients.-------------------------------------------------Job Family Group:-------------------------------------------------Job Family:------------------------------------------------------Time Type:------------------------------------------------------Citi is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer.Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.Citigroup Inc. and its subsidiaries ("Citi”) invite all qualified interested applicants to apply for career opportunities.
